abstract.t: The IETF "Constrained RESTful Environments" (CoRE) Working Group standardizes application layer protocols that can be used by resource-constrained devices, as can be found in the Internet of Things (IoT). It is part of a cluster of about a dozen IETF WGs defining specifications for these environments. This short document provides an overview of the activies of the CoRE WG as of end of March, 2020.
